content: after the heel decrease the stitches on the back stitches and continue in the of the leg by one by ending the sole stitches with k2tog k1 round i then get rid off the mini-gusset by decreasing by in row 15 start with working patterning on instep stitches 1 on each side 4 times in every transfer the last purl stitch of your instep stitches to the 3rd row 12 row knit two back of the leg and work patterning on the back as well row in established pattern 14 row knit to your preferred length minus about 1 inch in patterning do 12 row of twisted ribbing knit through back of loop ktbl purl 1 aligning the purl stitches in the pattern with one of the purl stitches in the ribbing i very much like jeny s bind off using your preferred stretchy bindoff method surprisingly stretchy bind off jssbo weave in ends http //www knitty com/issuefal l09/featjssbo php enjoy © la maison de saba 2014 as vanilla as it gets page 2 of 2 v 1 1
